patthana15.82:4.1: Saraṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.82:4.2: Araṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.82:5.1: Saraṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.82:5.2: Araṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.82:6.1: Araṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
